value.title: Ukraine Closes Schools, Bans Public Events Over Coronavirus
value.excerpt: In an attempt to prevent the spread of COVID-19, Ukraine closed schools and banned public events of 200 people or more, effective March 12. The new quarantine measures were introduced by the government despite the nation only having one registered case of coronavirus infection in the west of the country.
